# Quality Mode

Purpose:
- Apply all global story constraints after draft completion.

Rules:
- Enforce word band: 3000–7500 words.
- Enforce per-beat ±15% range.
- Apply grit thresholds.
- Apply craft-pillar checks.
- Passive ratio ≤ 0.25
- Adverb density ≤ 0.18
- Preserve vernacular tags.
- Never rewrite masked segments without explicit user instruction.
